recipesJson.name: Darling Flocks
recipesJson.author: Mindbugs
recipesJson.description: Watermelon juice that's a subtle flavor. You can add sweetener if you'd like, but it's not necessary. Ws-23 works really well too. Shake and vape works, but 3 days steep let's it all blend together. The name is just the apps suggested name, since I lack the creativity to come up with my own name.
